attributes.action: Oppose WANDSWORTH's 'Lowest Council Tax in UK in face of the 'ADVERSE CONSEQUENCES'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LATCHMERE WARD, lONDON SW11 residents,in UTMOST Deprivation. I.e. Shortest Life Span, lowest birth weight of babies born in Wandsworth, Highest incidents of 'Domestic Violence / Abuse'. Inbuilt comunity facilites, for high density living,SOLD!. Claim to have 'DECENT HOMES' Award for ALL housing stock, since 2007, in face of   condensation,Cold, in need of external Cladding, defective windows, Co2, Heat, emissions in 23 storie tower block etc. In SelfsatisfacTORY WANDSWORTH

rejection.details: We cannot accept a petition that refers to a politcal party in both the petition text and the petition title.
